director.name: 尼科莱特·克雷比茨 Nicolette Krebitz

introduction: On her way home from her uninspiring office job, Ania catches sight of an untamed wolf on the outskirts of the city. For a brief moment they lock eyes and the wolf’s gaze instantly changes Ania’s life. The young woman who seemed to have accepted the insignificance of her own existence is overwhelmed by a sensual longing for this wolf. She becomes obsessed with the wild and beautiful animal, and ruthlessly determined in her desire to domesticate it. Sexually charged and visually poetic, director Nicolette Krebitz articulately and sensitively explores this unique story of a young woman who gradually liberates herself from the conformism of society and the restrictions of femininity. Driven by Lilith Stangenberg's uncompromising performance, expect a unique and unpredictable love story and a cinematic accomplishment very much on the wild side.
